amendatorysection.catchline: Sections; not applicable to real estate within cities and villages or within three miles of cities and villages; not applicable to manufacturing or industrial establishments.
amendatorysection.para: The provisions of sections 76-402 to 76-413 shall not apply to any real estate lying within the corporate limits of cities and villages, or within three miles thereof, nor to any manufacturing or industrial establishment referred to in section 76-413.

annotation.para: Lands involved were not within the exception created by this section. Semrad v. Semrad, 170 Neb. 911, 104 N.W.2d 338 (1960).

This section and others referred to herein in conjunction with it do not deny equal protection of the law as guaranteed by the equal protection clause of the Fourteenth Amendment to the Constitution of the United States. Shames v. State of Nebraska, 323 F.Supp. 1321 (D. Neb. 1971).
